results.name: a(0)=1. a(n+1) = a(ceiling(n/a(n))) + 1.
comment: Records 1,2,3,4,5,... appear at n = 0, 1, 2, 5, 18, 87, 518, 3621,.. which appears to be essentially A094294. - _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 10 2015
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
